name: PhotoSuite Project File
summary: Learn about .PZP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MGI PhotoSuite was acquired by Roxio and was renamed to Roxio PhotoShow. PZP files created by PhotoSuite are not compatible with PhotoShow. However, PhotoSuite, which is now included with Roxio Creator, can open PZP files.

description: Project file created by PhotoSuite, a program used to edit digital photos; contains project images, settings, and resources; saves project as a layer-based compositions so that historical edits are modifiable; useful for creating templates for business cards, calendars, and greeting cards.
